login.introduction: Welcome to 121. Please log in below.
login.wrong-credentials: Your email and/or password are not recognized. Please try again.

main-menu.introduction: You have access to the following actions. Please select one.

view-appointments.introduction: For the following timeslots appointments have been scheduled. Select a timeslot to see details.
view-appointments.appointments: These are the appointments for the chosen timeslot:

scan-qr.introduction: Now scan the QR-code of the PA to identify him/her in the system.
